summary: The module defines a class that manages precipitation and evapotranspiration raster grids required by the MetaSWAP hydrological model. It validates the presence of a time dimension, constructs appropriate file names, and exports the grids as ESRI ASCII files compatible with MetaSWAP.
business_intent: Enable users to prepare and export meteorological raster datasets in the correct format and temporal structure for seamless integration into MetaSWAP simulations.
